author: arkurth
msg: Fixed problem in VIM_SSH.pm::_wait_for_task. It was calling _get_task_info and attempting to retrieve a hash element without checking if the hash was defined. Updated _get_task_info to always return a hash reference, which could potentially be empty.

author: shalin
msg: SOLR-6651: Fix wrong timeout logged in waitForReplicasToComeUp

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-4103 : Potential NPE when services get restarted

author: reschke
msg: OAK-1941 - in queries, avoid re-parsing content from the DB when it's already in the cache
